name: Wisdom Of The Insane DEMO VERSION #2
name_original: Wisdom Of The Insane DEMO VERSION #2
description:
Wisdom Of The Insane.

---WOTI--- Volume #1

My first Unity 5 game.

Its an Horror style 3D FPS game.

This is a DEMO VERSION ! not the full game.

Programming  by : TVM

Story by : TVM

Basic Animations by : TVM

Level Design by : TVM

Music by : Ross Budgen ( please check him out on Youtube he is awsome ! )

I am no pro programmer by any means so please dont expect much, what you see in the Youtube video is what you get.

This demo is 100% free to download and play.

Please please give me your feedback on the game if you play it ;) that would be awsome !

!! Please do not play on these graphics settings :

*Fastest

*Fast

*Simple

The game wont work ! More information about this can be found in the README file.

This game works on almost any pc/laptop on GOOD or better settings ;)

You can expect many many more updates to come for this game.
